variants.full_text: Iveena Green Tube Maxi Dress Turn heads effortlessly in this chic emerald green strapless dress, designed to blend elegance with a hint of playful charm. With its flowy silhouette and bold slit, this dress is perfect for both romantic evenings and stylish day outings. DETAILS : Strapless straight neckline for a sleek, modern vibe. Fitted, structured top that flatters the upper body. Slightly cinched at the waist to enhance curves. Flowing maxi length with soft pleats for movement. High side slit for a bold, feminine touch. SIZE AND FIT : Studio model is wearing size XS/6 UK Studio model measurements are : Height – 5.8″ Bust – 33″ Waist – 26″ Hip – 36″ MATERIAL & CARE : Main Fabric – Polyester Non Stretch

Its flowy silhouette and earthy tones make it perfect for sunny strolls, beachside dinners, or a chic casual day out. V-neckline for a chic, elongating effect. Soft puffed half sleeves with gentle gathers for a feminine touch. Smocked elastic waistband. Flowy A-line maxi style with tiered hem. Maxi length.
